casebody.data:
Circuit Court of the United States.

Raleigh, June Term, 1805. Dunlop & Co. vs. West, the Marshal. ‘jpER Curiam.

If the Sheriff or Marshal seizes property in execution, and neglects to seílít, and is sued for his neglect, the plaintiff shall recover damages, to the amount of what the property would have produced, had he sold it.
